# Encrypt using public key
Simple CLI tool to encrypt data using public key

## Installation

Local intallation
```bash
$ ./install.sh
```

## Usage

```bash
$ encrypt <public_key_url> <data>
```

## Example

```bash
$ encrypt https://healthidsbx.abdm.gov.in/api/v2/auth/cert 123456
```
Output:
```

```
